description: Flik MCP server: manage projects, stories, and bugs. API key from flik.nomadis.com.

lifecycle.reason: Missing required package metadata (runtimeHint or identifier)

name: io.github.pdeloulay/flik-mcp

environmentVariables.description: Flik API key (Bearer). Get one from flik.nomadis.com/keys.
environmentVariables.name: FLIK_KEY

environmentVariables.description: API base URL (default: https://flik.nomadis.com). Use http://localhost:8080 for local.
environmentVariables.name: FLIK_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: Default project acronym (e.g. POP) for project-scoped tools.
environmentVariables.name: FLIK_PROJECT

environmentVariables.description: Optional. Org slug for org-scoped tools; when not set, the key's org is used.
environmentVariables.name: FLIK_ORG

title: Flik
